body_html:
I added a flag "TENSORFLOW_USE_VERBS" to exclude all the verbs related code. Could you please ask Jenkins to start the build?

BTW, this line won't compile, will it? I suppose it's a typo for "#ifdef" https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/nccl/kernels/nccl_ops.cc#L16

body:
I added a flag "TENSORFLOW_USE_VERBS" to exclude all the verbs related code. Could you please ask Jenkins to start the build? 

BTW, this line won't compile, will it? I suppose it's a typo for "#ifdef"  https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/nccl/kernels/nccl_ops.cc#L16
